etymology.description: 足(足) (zú, "foot") + 夸(夸) (kuā, "boast") = foot's action with expansion -> action of striding or stretching the leg, meaning lend support to 跨(跨) (kuà, "straddle")
etymology.interpretation: The character 𡕒 is a variant form of 跨(跨) (kuà, "straddle") and involves 足(足) (zú, "foot"), which indicates an action involving the feet, and 夸(夸) (kuā, "boast"), which likely contributes the phonetic aspect. This combination helps convey the idea of spreading or extending legs across something.
